Modul model
Package de.kaiser.model.style

Klasse TextBlockStyleProperties

java.lang.Object
de.kaiser.model.style.ElementStyleProperties
de.kaiser.model.style.ElementBlockStyleProperties
de.kaiser.model.style.TextBlockStyleProperties
Bekannte direkte Unterklassen:
FootnoteStyleProperties, HeadlineStyleProperties, ListStyleProperties, ParagraphStyleProperties, TableCellStyleProperties, TableStyleProperties
public class TextBlockStyleProperties extends ElementBlockStyleProperties
Abstract base class for all block-level text elements. It contains common properties like font, color, and margins.

    • mergeWith

      public void mergeWith(ElementStyleProperties specific)
      Merges properties from a specific style into this one. All properties are set from the specific style if they are available. If they are not available this style is used
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      mergeWith in Klasse ElementBlockStyleProperties
      Parameter:
      specific - The specific style.

    • applyPropertiesTo

      protected void applyPropertiesTo(ElementBlockStyleProperties target)
      Helper method to apply all properties from this object to another. Used by the copy() method in concrete subclasses.
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      applyPropertiesTo in Klasse ElementBlockStyleProperties
      Parameter:
      target - The object to apply the properties to.
